entry.title: Zero Subset Sums and Laurent Polynomials

link.title: Zero Subset Sums and Laurent Polynomials

entry.summary: (Under Construction). Here we collect some trivial remarks on using polynomials and symbolic calculators, e.g. Mathematica, SymPy, to find zero subset sums.

entry.title: Welcome Back. The Year is 2023 AD.

link.title: Welcome Back. The Year is 2023 AD.

entry.summary: JHM Labs had to return to temporary work to continue funding our research. But we're back!

entry.title: Book Review. Quantum by Manjit Kumar.

link.title: Book Review. Quantum by Manjit Kumar.

entry.summary: Book Review on Manjir Kumar book titled Quantum: Einstein, Bohr, and the Great Debate About the Nature of Reality.

entry.title: Hamilton Weber Gibbs Liouville Measures on State Space

link.title: Hamilton Weber Gibbs Liouville Measures on State Space

entry.summary: We examine the Hamilton equations for Weber's potential in an isolated two-body system. We construct an invariant measure on the xv state space which is rather distinct from the conventional Gibbs Liouville measure.

entry.title: On Planck’s Constant h.
entry.summary: [Under Construction] We begin a review of Planck's constant $h$ in light of Weber's force law. This means re evaluating the Hamiltonian action of electrons in the hydrogen atom. This is the first of many more posts on the topic.
